SEARCH
Package Entity.Order

Class Order

java.lang.Object
Entity.Order.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Order extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an order placed in the restaurant. This class contains details such as order status, type, total price, items ordered, quantity, ID, branch name, and order placement time.
See Also:
